description: This promptware is used to translate natural language to SQL queries.
creator: OpenAI

sql_translate.name: sql_translate
sql_translate.description: This promptware is used to translate natural language to SQL queries.
sql_translate.instruction:
### Postgres SQL tables, with their properties:
#
# Employee(id, name, department_id)
# Department(id, name, address)
# Salary_Payments(id, employee_id, amount, date)
#
###

input.text:
A query to list the names of the departments which employed more than 10 employees in the last 3 months
SELECT

example.output:
d.name
FROM
    Department d
    INNER JOIN Employee e ON d.id = e.department_id
    INNER JOIN Salary_Payments sp ON e.id = sp.employee_id
WHERE
    sp.date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH)
GROUP BY
    d.name
HAVING
    COUNT(e.id) > 10

example_prompt:
### Postgres SQL tables, with their properties:

# Salary_Payments(id, employee_id, amount, date)
#
### 

A query to list the names of the departments which employed more than 10 employees in the last 3 months
